paper_abstract: This paper proposes an application of rough sets as a data preprocessing front end for support vector classifier (SVC). A novel multi-class support vector classification strategy based on binary tree is also presented. The binary tree extends the pairwise discrimination capability of the SVC to the multi-class case naturally. Experimental results on benchmark datasets show that proposed method can reduce computation complexity without decreasing classification accuracy compare to SVC without data preprocessing.
paper_title: Data dimension reduction using rough sets for support vector classifier
